Lyric:
[by:木木爱学习]
[ti:You Can Trust In Me]
[00:01.10]You Can Trust In Me - Hotel Saint George
[00:14.29]I know
[00:16.49]It is hard to fall in love
[00:20.84]When you feel blue
[00:23.35]Deep inside your heart
[00:28.14]I'm sure
[00:30.34]You got so much more to give
[00:34.69]Believe in me
[00:37.25]I can let it shine again
[00:42.09]Surrender
[00:44.23]Baby please surrender
[00:47.68]I will be so tender
[00:51.15]If you trust in me
[00:55.96]Pretender
[00:58.04]I won't be pretender
[01:01.54]Baby please surrender
[01:05.01]If you trust in me
[01:09.97]You know
[01:11.99]these are not only words (not only words)
[01:16.55]I know it's true
[01:18.94]look into my eyes
[01:23.68]I'm sure
[01:25.93]If you wanna feel the same
[01:30.22]Believe in me
[01:33.25]I will let it shine again
[01:37.82]Surrender
[01:39.66]Baby please surrender
[01:43.36]I will be so tender
[01:46.78]If you trust in me
[01:51.67]pretender
[01:53.76]i won t be pretender
[01:57.19]baby please surrender you can trust in me
[02:05.17]RAP I spend my nights and days
[02:07.63]Try to do my best and I confess
[02:09.98]So I guess that our love aren't gonna be less
[02:13.05]And must believe my promises days are true
[02:16.42]Draw the tears from your eyes no more stupid lies for you
[02:20.05]Believe in me you can trust in me
[02:23.34]Believe in me you can trust in me
[02:26.62]Believe in me you can trust in me
[02:30.14]If you trust in me
[02:33.41]Surrender
[02:35.50]Baby please surrender
[02:38.97]I will be so tender
[02:42.36]If you trust in me
[02:47.34]Pretender
[02:49.54]I won't be pretender
[02:52.81]Baby please surrender
[02:56.40]If you trust in me If you trust in me
